lines.text:
[in tears]
Stephanie, something's wrong with me and I don't know what it is. I've been having these awful nightmares, these headaches, the hair, it's driving me up the wall.
There's a bald maniac in there, and he's going bat shit!

[grabbing Jerry]
You dirty killer bastard, you!
You and Wayne, I'll get your Wayne! He's gone crazy from that acid you sold him, and so did your wife!
